sections.heading: lots; section, how construed.Section 76-283 shall be construed to apply to rights acquired previous to the entry of the land; and in no case to the rights of parties acquired under or by virtue of any tax sale
shall be construed to apply to rights acquired previous to the entry of the land; and in no case to the rights of parties acquired under or by virtue of any tax sale
